ui.webhookHint: Create a Webhook in your Discord server and copy the URL here
ui.enterValidWebhookUrl: Please enter a valid Discord Webhook URL
ui.customPromptPlaceholder:
Enter your instructions for how AI should process this tweet...

Examples:
- Rewrite this tweet into a professional technical article summary
- Extract key information and organize into bullet points
- Translate to Traditional Chinese and add personal comments
ui.discordWebhookHint: Create a webhook in your Discord server (Server Settings → Integrations → Webhooks)
ui.openaiApiKeyHint: Get API key from OpenAI website
ui.anthropicApiKeyHint: Get API key from Anthropic website
ui.apiKeysDescription: Your API keys are only stored in your browser and are not sent anywhere else. Processing requests are sent directly from your browser to the API provider.
ui.apiKeyWarning: Warning: You selected an AI provider but did not enter an API key. Without a key, the summary feature will not work properly.

ai.summarizeTweet: Please summarize this tweet concisely in Traditional Chinese, keep it under 200 words
ai.summarizeTweetEn: Summarize this tweet concisely. Keep the summary under 200 characters if possible.
ai.summarizeTweetWithImages: Please summarize this tweet and its images concisely in Traditional Chinese, keep it under 200 words
ai.summarizeTweetWithImagesEn: Summarize this tweet and its images concisely. Keep the summary under 200 characters if possible.
